summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of East Prospect Street and East park Drive, from Summit Avenue North to Eleventh Avenue North; East Highland Drive, from Harvard Avenue North to Volunteer Park; East Aloha Street, from Boylston Avenue North to Tenth Avenue North; North Broadway, from East Roy Street to East Highland Drive; Harvard Avenue North, from East Roy Street to East Aloha Street; Boylston Avenue North, from East Roy Street to East Prospect Street; and Bellevue Place, from Bellevue Place, from Bellevue Avenue North to Boylston Avenue North, all in the City of Seattle, by constructing concrete walks grading and curbing where necessary, and providing for the necessary drainage and for necessary connections to existing improvement, all in accordance with Resolution No. 1044 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Payment by Bonds," as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle
